function.name: read_and_parse_csv
function.description: function to read a csv from the given path and select a slice from the given start/end indices as well as the selected columns.

file_path.description: the file path of the data to be loaded

start_idx.description: the index of the start of the selection

end_idx.description: the index of the end of the selection

columns.description: the columns to be selected from the data
